name: get_coordinates
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool geolocate.
Tool description: The Geocoding Flask API is a simple and efficient way to convert addresses and places into their corresponding latitude and longitude coordinates.
API description: This function sends a GET request to the "/geocode" endpoint to obtain the geographical coordinates of a given address using the RapidAPI service.

address.description: The address or place to geocode. Defaults to '1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA'.
